description: Jordbrugets Uddannelses Center Aarhus (The Green Academy), located in Denmark, offers diverse vocational training in fields such as landscaping, horticulture, and agriculture. With a focus on sustainability, the Center engages in international projects, including Erasmus+, sending and receiving students to enhance their knowledge in animal welfare and environmental practices. The initiative aims to cultivate smart, environmentally conscious graduates who can contribute positively to the evolving food system and climate challenges.
name: Jordbrugets Uddannelses Center Aarhus
